resources.string: Please enter your ePotato-ID / phone number and password.
There is no account with that ePotato-ID / phone number.
Please enter your ePotato-ID or phone number.
You can\'t recover your password, because you didn\'t set a phone number. We\'re sorry :(
We have sent you a new password via SMS.
Please enter your new password into both fields.
The password must be at least 4 characters long!
Please enter a username and a password.
The username can only contain letters, numbers, \'.\', \'-\', \'_\' and must be under 30 characters.
Please enter a valid phone number.
A new code has been sent to:\u0020
You logged in as a new user! Would you like to continue? Everything of the old user will be deleted!
You don\'t have any ePotato-Contacts yet!
Please allow this app (in the next screen) to read your phone\'s contact list to show you your contacts that already use ePotato!
Hi! Check out ePotato to send virtual potatoes! onnoeberhard.com/ePotato
Do you want to delete this contact?
Please allow this app (in the next screen) to save the image to the device\'s storage!
You did not select any receivers! Would you like to close without sending?
Please enter a username and your password.
Error :( Please try logging out and in again.
Please enter your current and new password into the fields.
Do you want to log out? Everything will be saved.
Thank your very much for your purchase! The app needs to restart to finish the process
Do you really want to delete your account? This cannot be undone!
Please enter the password you just received (or will receive shortly) at:\n%1$s
This lets your friends find you when they join ePotato.
Please enter the code you just received (or will receive shortly) at:\n%1$s
Receive notifications for updates in your feed.
If enabled, you can send / receive potatoes via the \'total strangers\' feature.

&appname; is created by Onno Eberhard :)

Version %1$s.


More Here

This phone number is already in use :(\\nIf it is yours, try the \'Forgot Password\' function.
